name: TaskUs, Inc.
description: TaskUs, Inc. is a leading provider of outsourcing solutions, specializing in customer experience (CX) and business process outsourcing (BPO) services. Founded in 2008 by Bryce Maddock and Jaspar Weir, TaskUs has transformed the way companies manage customer interactions and operational efficiency by leveraging technology and a highly skilled workforce. The company serves a diverse range of industries, including technology, e-commerce, gaming, and healthcare, providing services such as customer support, content moderation, and back-office solutions. TaskUs is committed to enhancing the customer journey through innovative approaches and personalized service, enabling its clients to focus on their core business while maximizing customer satisfaction. With a strong emphasis on company culture and employee well-being, TaskUs has been recognized as a great place to work, fostering an environment that encourages creativity and growth. The company's mission is to empower the world’s most innovative companies to deliver exceptional experiences for their customers, while maintaining a focus on sustainability and social responsibility. TaskUs continues to expand its global footprint, establishing delivery centers in key locations to better serve its clients and adapt to the ever-changing demands of the digital landscape.

seo.meta_title: TaskUs, Inc. | Customer Experience and Outsourcing Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore TaskUs, Inc., a leader in customer experience and outsourcing solutions. Learn about our innovative services and commitment to client success.

faq.question: What services does TaskUs offer?
faq.answer: TaskUs offers customer support, content moderation, technical support, and back-office solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of TaskUs?
faq.answer: Bryce Maddock is the CEO of TaskUs, Inc.

faq.question: Where is TaskUs headquartered?
faq.answer: TaskUs is headquartered in San Antonio, Texas, USA.
